map.item:
In this experiment, we are interested in how well you can judge the concrete/abstractness of a word.
A series of words will be spoken. Your task is to judge whether each word is CONCRETE or Abstract.
This experiment will start by familiarizing you with some concrete and abstract words first, the test session.
Only during the test session will you be required you to make responses.
Please refrain from counting or foot-tapping. It is very important to remember duration by heart.
Press SPACE to begin listening to sample concrete and abstract words.
The word was: CONCRETE.
The word was: ABSTRACT.
There are no more sample concrete and abstract words.
